com.mr_apps.androidbase.activity

Class PermissionManagerActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.mr_apps.androidbase.activity.PermissionManagerActivity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocationActivity

    public abstract class PermissionManagerActivity
extends AppCompatActivity
    Class that manages all the base runtime permissions for API > 23 devices

    • Method Detail

      • checkOrRequestPermission

        public boolean checkOrRequestPermission(java.lang.String permission,
                               int titleId,
                               int messageId)
        Checks if a permission has already been accepted by the user, and request it if not
        Parameters:
        permission - the permission that the user must accept
        titleId - the string's resource id of the title of the dialog to show, if the permission was denied in the past
        messageId - the string's resource id of the message of the dialog to show, if the permission was denied in the past
        Returns:
        true if the permission was already accepted, false otherwise

      • checkOrRequestPermission

        public boolean checkOrRequestPermission(java.lang.String permission,
                               java.lang.String title,
                               java.lang.String message)
        Checks if a permission has already been accepted by the user, and request it if not
        Parameters:
        permission - the permission that the user must accept
        title - the title of the dialog to show, if the permission was denied in the past
        message - the message of the dialog to show, if the permission was denied in the past
        Returns:
        true if the permission was already accepted, false otherwise

      • checkPermission

        public boolean checkPermission(java.lang.String permission)
        Checks if the system already has the permission
        Parameters:
        permission - the permission yo check
        Returns:
        true if the permission already has been accepted, false otherwise
